name: Bomby Run - Level 7, Bat Nest v1.0
name_original: Bomby Run - Level 7, Bat Nest v1.0
description:
Play it on Pc or Mobil Phone! (Browser Game)

German Description: In diesem Spiel befinden sie, der Spieler sich als Bomby in einer Höhle wieder um seinen Freund zu finden. Bomby liebt Münzen, besonders die roten! In dieser Höhle gibt es gefährliche Feinde, die du besiegen kannst, indem du eine Wirbel Attacke ausführst! Manche von ihnen halten 1-2 Treffer aus, manche nehmen überhaupt keinen Schaden. 

English Description: In this game you, the Player find yourself as Bomby in a cave to find his friend. Bomby loves coins, especially the red ones! In this cave there are dangerous enemies that you can defeat by doing a spin attack! Some of them take 1-2 hits, some take no damage at all. 

 Game made by Lord Zcoper 

------------------------------------------

Difficulty: Medium 😐

------------------------------------------

Update: v1.0  

-Game release! 

How to play:
------------------------------------------
Controls:  
Run Left:                 Arrow Left
Run Right:              Arrow Right
Jump:                        Arrow Up
2x Jump:                 Arrow Up 2x
------------------------------------------ 
Score:
Become a better Score by collecting the coins!
Normal Coin: + 14
Red Coin:         +300

NEW ELEMENT! Since Level 7, Bat Nest, I present you the new game element! The "Minecart"   

It moves straight on its own. What you can do is jump with the up arrow key. With the left arrow key you can slow down the minecart and with the right arrow key you can speed it up. With the Minecart you only have 1 life so don't risk anything and follow the coins

------------------------------------------
Tips and Tricks:
Regenerate by collecting heart items (Full Health)
Jump on Enemies to deafet them!
Watch ahead to avoid unwanted situations!
Play on the Mobil Phone!
Look for the Timer! If it's shut down to 0 you Die!

------------------------------------------
Player 

Health:                  3 Hearts
Damage:               1 Heart
Speed:                    700
Jump strenght: 1100

Traffic Light 
Warns you of Deadly Routes. Drives the opposite direction from where the traffic light comes from. For example:
Traffic light comes from above, drive along below

------------------------------------------
Enemies:

Cave Beetle 
Location:    Everywhere
Health:        1 Heart
Damage:     1 Heart
Typ:                Ground unit
Weakness: Jump on them
Special:        Nothing

Bat 
Location:    Everywhere
Health:        2 Hearts
Damage:     1 Heart
Typ:                Flying unit
Weakness: Jump on them
Special:        Nothing

Stalactite 
Location:    Everywhere
Health:        Infinity Hearts
Damage:     1 Heart
Typ:                Ground unit
Weakness: Trigger them from a save distance
Special:        Different Sizes

Spikes 
Location:    Crystal Zone
Health:        Infinity Hearts
Damage:     1 Heart
Typ:                Ground unit
Weakness: Nothing
Special:        Can't be damaged

Echo Bat 
Location:    Everywhere
Health:        1 Heart
Damage:     1 Heart
Typ:                Flying unit
Weakness: Can't move
Special:         Shoot Echo's

Echo

Health:        Infinity Hearts
Damage:     1 Heart
Typ:                Flying unit
Weakness: Nothing
Special:        Can't be damaged

Lava Skull 
Location:    Lava Zone
Health:        Infinity Hearts
Damage:     1 Heart
Typ:                Flying unit

Red Crystals 
Location:    Lava Zone

Damage:     Infinity Hearts
Typ:                Ground unit

Special:        Can't be damaged
